item.title: COVID-19: Unemployment and Income Supports June Wave
item.description: This is a collaboration with Rebecca Hasdell and David Rehkopf. The post provides an updated analysis to the post COVID-19: Unemployment and Income Supports April Wave by including data available until the June wave of the current Population Survey. For more details please refer to the preius post. Statistical Exploration We are interested in analyzing the effects of COVID-19 on the employment status with a focus on the Earned Income Tax Credit (EITC).
